name: Wumpus (Tab Books)
overview: The primordial cave-crawling strategy hunting game type is visited once again, with most of the fundamentals the same: the player is searching through a randomized maze for a stinky monster, the Wumpus, which can be neutralized from an adjacent room but will end the player's game if encountered directly. This version is from the book "101 Programming Surprises & Tricks for Your Commodore 64 Computer"
